bug.short_desc: Move RPC backend docu to qooxdoo.org/contrib

long_desc.thetext: The RPC backend docus for Java, PHP, Perl and Python are still part of the (0.8) manual (e.g. http://qooxdoo.org/documentation/0.8/rpc_perl), although they have been forked out to be contributions. It would improve consistency of our wiki documenation if they were allocated like other contributions (ie. as http://qooxdoo.org/contrib/project/rpcperl etc.).

Imported former wiki page http://qooxdoo.org/documentation/rpc as manual/source/pages/communication/rpc_overview.rst; it should be merged with rpc.rst ("rpc_overview" is just a made up name, to have a separate file) and then deleted.

Moved all manual RPC pages (manual/source/pages/communication/rpc_java.rst, rpc_perl.rst, rpc_php.rst, rpc_python.rst) to the contrib wiki (http://qooxdoo.org/contrib/project/rpcjava, rpcperl, rpcphp, rpcpython).

Tristan, I did most of the bug's work. Could you please fix the 1.4 manual and merge the pages manual/source/pages/communication/rpc.rst and rpc_overview.rst into a single page (rpc.rst), removing broken links and making it a coherent whole?! The links to the various RPC backends should be all removed and just replaced with a single link to the contrib wiki (http://qooxdoo.org/contrib/project#backend).
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
